blocks.heading: Sentinel helps teams enforce policy as code for HashiCorp products

tutorialCards.description: Learn how policy as code lets you define, version, test, and deploy policies  in a safe, consistent, and repeatable way. Try Sentinel.
tutorialCards.heading: What is Policy as Code with Sentinel?

tutorialCards.description: Install Sentinel on Mac, Linux, or Windows by downloading the binary, then verify you installed Sentinel successfully.
tutorialCards.heading: Install Sentinel

tutorialCards.description: Create a basic Sentinel policy for HashiCups to validate coffee orders.  Define rules, use conditional logic, and test the policy using the Sentinel  CLI. Learn the fundamentals of policy structure and evaluation.
tutorialCards.heading: Write your first policy

tutorialCards.description: Enhance the HashiCups policy by implementing reusable functions. Refactor the  policy to handle multiple items in an order, create parameterized validation  functions, and understand how functions improve code organization and  maintainability.
tutorialCards.heading: Simplify policy logic with Sentinel function

tutorialCards.description: Create a Sentinel module to centralize common variables and functions for  HashiCups policies. Learn how to import and use modules, update policies to  leverage shared components, and understand the benefits of modularization in  policy development.
tutorialCards.heading: Centralize and share policy components with Sentinel modules

tutorialCards.description: Incorporate external JSON data into HashiCups policies using Sentinel static  imports. Configure static imports in sentinel.hcl, update policies to use  imported data, and explore the advantages of separating data from policy logic.
tutorialCards.heading: Integrate external data with Sentinel static imports

tutorialCards.description: Develop a comprehensive test suite for HashiCups Sentinel policies. Create  test cases for various scenarios, use mock data to simulate different inputs,  and run tests using the Sentinel CLI. Learn best practices for ensuring policy reliability and correctness.
tutorialCards.heading: Test Sentinel policies

metadata.title: Sentinel by HashiCorp
metadata.description: Sentinel is a language and framework for policy built to be embedded in existing software to enable fine-grained, logic-based policy decisions.

product.description: Learn about policy as code with HashiCorp Sentinel.
